            function gtmAddToBasket(elem) {
                var id = elem.data('skucode') || "";
                var name = elem.data('name') || "";
                var price = elem.data('price') || "";
                var category = elem.data('category') || "";
                var brand = elem.data('brand') || "";
                var quantity = elem.data('quantity') || "";
                var dimension1 = elem.data('dimension1') || "";
                var size = elem.data('size') || "";
                var subcategory = elem.data('subcategory') || "";
                var variant = elem.data('variant') || "";

                window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                window.dataLayer.push({
                    event: 'eec.add',
                    ecommerce: {
                        add: {
                            actionField: {
                                list: 'Shopping cart'
                            },
                            products: [
                                {
                                    dimension1: dimension1,
                                    size: size,
                                    id: id,
                                    name: name,
                                    price: price,
                                    category: category,
                                    brand: brand,
                                    quantity: quantity,
                                    subcategory: subcategory,
                                    variant: variant
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    }
                });
            }

            $(function () {
                $('.gtm-add-to-basket').on('click',
                    function (e) {

                        gtmAddToBasket($(this));

                    });
            });

            function gtmAddToBasket(elem) {
                var id = elem.data('skucode') || "";
                var name = elem.data('name') || "";
                var price = elem.data('price') || "";
                var category = elem.data('category') || "";
                var brand = elem.data('brand') || "";
                var quantity = elem.data('quantity') || "";
                var dimension1 = elem.data('dimension1') || "";
                var size = elem.data('size') || "";
                var subcategory = elem.data('subcategory') || "";
                var variant = elem.data('variant') || "";

                window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                window.dataLayer.push({
                    event: 'eec.add',
                    ecommerce: {
                        add: {
                            actionField: {
                                list: 'Shopping cart'
                            },
                            products: [
                                {
                                    dimension1: dimension1,
                                    size: size,
                                    id: id,
                                    name: name,
                                    price: price,
                                    category: category,
                                    brand: brand,
                                    quantity: quantity,
                                    subcategory: subcategory,
                                    variant: variant
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    }
                });
            }

            $(function () {
                $('.gtm-add-to-basket').on('click',
                    function (e) {

                        gtmAddToBasket($(this));

                    });
            });
